   "body_snippet": "Remote Desktop (mstsc) has shortcut of CTRL+ALT+HOME which activates control bar and lets you to get outside from remote connection.\r\nSee: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/termserv/terminal-services-shortcut-keys\r\n\r\nI would expect mRemoteNG to work the similar way.",

+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "Adding a global hotkey (CTRL+ALT+HOME) to activate mRemoteNG is a valid enhancement request for better accessibility."
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [],

-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): Adding a global hotkey (CTRL+ALT+HOME) to activate mRemoteNG is a valid enhancement request for better accessibility.\nApproach: Add RegisterHotKey/UnregisterHotKey to NativeMethods. In FrmMain, register the hotkey on load and handle WM_HOTKEY in WndProc to activate the window."
 }
